Address.value: 6244 185TH AVENUE NE,SUITE 100, REDMOND, Washington, 98052, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Microvision Inc is engaged in developing a lidar sensor to be used in automotive safety and autonomous driving applications. Its lidar sensor uses laser beam scanning (LBS) technology, which is based on systems that include micro-electrical mechanical systems (MEMS), laser diodes, optomechanics, electronics, algorithms, and software. The company has also developed solutions for Augmented Reality, Interactive Displays, and Consumer Lidars.
